  • Method Details

    • isNotNumber

      public static boolean isNotNumber(String number)
      Checks if a String is not a number.
      Parameters:
      number - Receives a String
      Returns:
      Returns true if that String is not a number

    • checkValidInput

      public static void checkValidInput(String[] separated) throws InvalidSyntaxException
      Receives a String array of inputs,
      Parameters:
      separated - receives an array of String as parameter.
      Throws:
      InvalidSyntaxException - throws InvalidSyntaxException if that array is not of length 3, if the second index of that array is not a number, if the third index of that array is not a char between A and Z.

    • getOpponent

      public static Battleship.PlayerHandler getOpponent(Battleship game, Battleship.PlayerHandler playerHandler) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      Parameters:
      game - receives a Battleship game as parameter
      playerHandler - receives a PlayerHandler as parameter
      Returns:
      returns a PlayerHandler that is not himself, if there is one,
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - and throws a PlayerNotFoundException if there is none.

    • checkPlayerPoints

      public static void checkPlayerPoints(Battleship.PlayerHandler playerHandler, PointValues type) throws NotEnoughPointsException
      Checks if a player has enough points to call a certain command.
      Parameters:
      playerHandler - receives PlayerHandler representing a player.
      type - receives PointValues representing the cost in player points for each command.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughPointsException - if the player does not have enough points to call that command.

    • checkInvalidPosition

      public static boolean checkInvalidPosition(int row, int col, List<List<String>> opponentMap)
      Check's if the coordinates received for row and column are valid for the map boundaries. Row must not exceed the List size. Column must not exceed the size of the List within the List (index represented by row).
      Parameters:
      row - receives int representing row on the map.
      col - receives int representing column on the map.
      opponentMap - receives List of a List of Strings representing a map.
      Returns:
      returns true if either row or column are bigger than map size, thus exceeding the boundaries of the map.

    • checkForMine

      public static boolean checkForMine(Battleship.PlayerHandler otherPlayer, int row, int col)
      Parameters:
      otherPlayer - Receives a PlayerHandler
      row - receives an int that represents a row as parameter
      col - receives another int that represents a column as parameter
      Returns:
      returns true if that coordinate in that PlayerHandler's Map has the char 'O'

    • mineExplosion

      public static void mineExplosion(Battleship.PlayerHandler player, Battleship.PlayerHandler opponent, int row, int col)
      Marks the mine at opponent's map has hit, and shoots randomly at player's own map as backfire.
      Parameters:
      player - receives a PlayerHandler as the one who shot the opponent's mine.
      opponent - receives a PlayerHandler as the one who's mine was targeted.
      row - receives int representing the row of that mine.
      col - receives int representing the column of that mine.

    • checkHit

      public static void checkHit(Battleship.PlayerHandler playerHandler, Battleship.PlayerHandler opponent, int row, int col)
      Checks if a ship was hit by one player's shot, and marks it as hit if true. If a ship was not hit, it also marks the spot on the map.
      Parameters:
      playerHandler - receives a PlayerHandler as the one who shot.
      opponent - receives a PlayerHandler as the one who was targeted.
      row - receives int representing the row of that shot.
      col - receives int representing the column of that shot.
